values: Bonus: Maturity in ChristBonus: Maturity in Christ

Pastor Steve Jeffery, in a session with the men of All Saints Church, talks about pursuing maturity in Christ. Maturity is here defined as continuously growing more and more into Christ-like-ness, and embraces a very wide variety of things. Visit our website: https://www.allsaintskirk.com Worship with us: 11:00 AM Sundays
